caption: Comfy spot with great pizza. Get the grandma pie!
Great service, I’ll be definitely coming back.

A little spot you might miss if you drive by too fast. But slowed down and check it out.  Simple food that tastes great. The only thing better than the food is the owners and the service.  One of the best.
This place is first-rate and broad, the meals was delightful and the rates were very inexpensive. fast, efficient service and very personal waiters. Highly recommended.
Nicest people in the world. Oh, did I forgot to say the pizza is great too ? Parking is plentiful, next to the clear view and cross island, no reason not to try it
Great food outstanding service
Best Italian restaurant in Bayside
Excellent pizza! Grandma pie is top notch! Rocco, Marco and staff are excellent!
I like this restaurant even now that I can not enjoy its cooking there because the service has always been perfect and the staff always polite.
Love this place💚
(Translated by Google) This is delicious!  (Original) ここは美味しい！
I had a very good meatball Parmigiano hero. I go there regularly for a cheese slice and a Sicilian slice. They have a very loyal customer base.
Always excellent pizza.
Nice people food is fine no problem supporting there bussiness. The father is a gentleman and it carried down to the son.

Yesterday was the first time we went to this fine restaurant. But It is no doubt not the last. We had great time with the efficient service, with the great  dishes and booze and with the decent payment. We will surely return there again.
I didnt even go in here but I'd recommend to a friend
One of the best pizza places in nyc
This place is good! Affordable rates, large portions and the employees are consistently super nice.
there pizza might be good but service not that good
Best pizza in town, 100% authentic Definitely recommend it to everyone!!!!
Our family favorite ❤👍
Great place for Italian food
Family and I have been eating pizza here for almost two decades. Easily best pizza in New York
guys at the counter are extremely rude.
Great place to eat. It’s our local pizza and pasta place. Service is great and workers/owners are super friendly. They always take Great care of my family when we stop in.
Fantastic place to buy some food when in a hurry. The customer service is rapid, rates are convenient, great ambience. I highly recommend this place
The best grandma slice by far
When I come in and order my usual pizza slice, the guys behind the counter are always welcoming and smiling!! Great pizza and great folks!
Great food and service! Treated us like family!
#great food
Must stop by and enjoy their food.
It truly takes skill to mess up mozzarella garlic bread
Absolutely great!
Very nice people and good food 🙂
What can i say a great slice of pizza

Filthy place. They are very cheap owners. Desperately needs to be renovated. Disgusting bathrooms & filthy bathroom doors. Recently raised their prices and giving smaller portions. This place been here for a long time. They no longer care …
Favorite local pizza place.
Great place for plain pizza slices and owner is so nice
Fantastic Pizza pie

Ordered from here tonight and was probably one of the worst pies I ever had.. it was burnt, dry and had no flavor. The pie had hardly any cheese or sauce.  There was only 2-3 slices of pepperoni per slice. I would not recommend
Delicious food and great wait staff
Great pie!
Delicious pizza,overlooking the sound. Highly recommend
Excellent!!
The best pizza around
The food is delicious and the owner and his sons are warm and welcoming
Very good food at a reasonable price.  Staff is always friendly.  Feels like home whenever I'm there.
Cannolis are the best!!!!
Fresh pizza
Our family neighborhood restaurant; good authentic Italian comfort food.

Simply one of the best and most consistently great pizza places around. Very warm atmosphere. The owner Rocco and his staff have made me and my family feel at home for about 20 years. Though we don't get to visit nearly enough, we are treated like old friends every time we visit.
Have been coming here for over 20 year's.  Great food and service friendly staff.   Papa the owner is truly a diamond in the rough.   Always feel welcome like family.
Best pizza and Italian on the island.
AMAZING FOOD
People who work there are very nice and treat customers with much respect
Thin crusty pizza slices, white sauce pasta and garlic bread are recommended, and their cappuccino is quite good!
Always amazing food with excellent service!!
Delicious pizza, friendly staff, reasonable prices. Recommended
Rocco and his staff are wonderful.  Food and service are great.  I love getting a slice here when in a rush.
Pizza was good, staff is very weird  around people who aren't local to the area. Seems like more a location for older individuals and families than a younger crowd.
The pizza here is awesome. This is our new favorite place to get some pizza.
People of every night the food is very good
Great thin slices. Get 3 though.
One of my favorite pizza places in Queens. I grew up on this pizza!
Great service. Great breads awesome food been coming here for years
All time favorite pizza place.
Is the best food specially the calamari, overall the whole food 💯 they cook with love ❤️
meatball hero was pretty good. but the bred broke apart when its too soggy.
good place to go.!
Delicious food great Sicilian pizza
been eating there a few times a week since 1999.  really friendly staff and owners.
Friendly, cozy tasty family restaurant.  I have been coming here for years and food always fresh and tasty

Recently moved to the area and found this gem in the neighborhood shopping plaza. Great Pizza and Great Food. We are working our way through the menu and have so far loved everything. The menu is extensive, and they will make everything to …
Best Sicilian slice in the area. Really good.
Good pizza.
Best
The food there is the best! Me and my family love the food and the people that work there! :)
I have been going here for years and what I can tell you is that the only thing better than the service is the food.
My absolute  go to Italian  Restaurant.  The food is great and reasonably  priced. Finish  off with the best cappuccino in Queens.
great family environment. . best pizza in nyc
The best in Queens by far.  Great family!

AMAZING.. This is the word that pops up in my head when I think of the food, the people, the owners, the cappuccino. I just love this place. and I recommend to all! I simply love everything about this place.
Great hospitaly

I've had the pizza, and it's OK. Tonight we ordered chicken parm dinners....  To say they were bad implies that they had any actual taste to them.   When it did taste like something, it wasn't good.  This was the blandest, most flavorless …
it's great
Was up from Pittsburgh, PA to work at Ft. Totten a few years back, some of the best pizza I have ever had. Next time in NY, make sure you go out of your way to hit up this small hot spot.
Their pizza is very very good!  We have it once week.  Not to salty, not to tangy, just perfect!

Pulled into plaza by accident and decided to have lunch.  We were amazed at quality of food and variety of entrees available.  Atmosphere was missing but 1st generation Italians provided authenticity.  Will stop intentionally now every time I'm in neighborhood.  Skip the pizza and order from menu or daily special board!
